fields.name: Gone out of sight
fields.description: Triggered as soon as a movable gets out of the configured place(s) detector's range.

fields.name: Seen at place
fields.description: Triggered immediately after a movable is seen at any of the configured places.

fields.name: 'Seen at place after specific event occurrence
fields.description: Triggered immediately after a movable is seen at a place after a specific event occurred.

fields.name: Same place for more than X minutes
fields.description: Triggered if a movable stays in the same place for more than the configured time.

fields.name: Low battery
fields.description: Triggered whenever the battery level for a movable goes below 10%.
